Articles.Content:
A 1971 NASA document about the lunar rover. Might give you inspiration for your next Kerbal version.

http://silodrome.com/lunar-rover-operations-handbook/

arrgh, forgot the title tag
I tried to replicate the LRV with the new seats but my first one didn't look that good. I guess i have to give it another go.
Hey you found it I used this same document as reference to develop the first LRV for Orbiter Flight Simulator's NASSP addon That was in 2002, so 11 years ago...wow...Memories
